alert.note: Alert for Lower Washington County; Southern Mountains; Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 2:22PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Washington County through 245 PM MDT... At 222 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Quail Creek State Park, or 22 miles west of Zion National Park, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Washington, Hurricane, La Verkin, Quail Creek State Park, Toquerville and Leeds. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 15 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
